item.title: APPEARANCE
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
EASY TO CONFIGURE Unlimited ways to configure your theme by changing the backgrounds, text colors, and foreground graphics.
MORE THAN 30 DIFFERENT BACKGROUNDS Lots and lots of background patterns to choose from.
ONE FILE FOR ALL Change only one file to change all the foreground image elements.

item.title: Appearance
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
EASY TO CONFIGURE

Unlimited ways to configure your theme by changing the backgrounds, text colors, and foreground graphics. Also choose the color for the content background and the font face for the headers from a list of 6 font-families.

MORE THAN 30 DIFFERENT BACKGROUNDS

Lots and lots of background patterns to choose from.

ONE FILE FOR ALL

Change only one file to change all the foreground image elements.

item.title: Where the whild things are
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: An adaptation of Maurice Sendak's classic children's story, where Max, a disobedient little boy sent to bed without his supper, creates his own world--a forest inhabited by ferocious wild creatures that crown Max as their ruler.

item.title: A clockwork orange
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: A Clockwork Orange is a 1962 dystopian novella by Anthony Burgess. Written from the perspective of a seemingly .

item.title: FANTASTIC MR. FOX
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Fantastic Mr Fox is a children's novel written by British author Roald Dahl. It was published in 1970 by George Allen & Unwin in the UK and Alfred A. Knopf in the U.S

item.title: Black Swan
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: BLACK SWAN follows the story of Nina (Portman), a ballerina in a New York City ballet.

item.title: Boogie Nights
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Not the kind of artwork youd expect for a film like Boogie Nights but the illustration is great.

item.title: Fight Club
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Great idea for a cover and the actual DVD box itself is a really smart sleeve.

item.title: The Warriors
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: This isnt the DVD artwork but I believe its the original theatrical poster and it fits the style of the film perfectly.

item.title: Blade Runner
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: This version isnt the original or the most famous but I prefer it due to the montage being so good.
